item.title: 最富有的美国人保持了经济繁荣。当他们停止消费时会发生什么？
item.description:
股市下滑威胁着财富效应，而财富效应是大流行后经济扩张的主要推动力。【原文：

The stock market slide threatens a wealth effect that’s been a key driver of the post-pandemic expansion.

item.title: 德国私营部门以 10 个月来最快速度扩张
item.description: 德国私营部门以 10 个月来最快的速度增长，因为人们希望政府支出的大幅增长将超过美国关税带来的打击。【原文：Germany’s private sector grew at the quickest pace in 10 months on hopes that a massive increase in government spending will outweigh any hit from US tariffs.】

item.title: 移动支付平台 Mukuru 致力于发展非洲业务
item.description: Mukuru 有限公司是一家在非洲运营的数字支付平台，随着在线交易的日益普及，该公司正瞄准更多地区进行扩张。【原文：Mukuru Ltd., a digital payments platform operating across Africa, is targeting more regional expansion as the popularity of online transactions grows.】

item.title: 法国商业活动因工厂复苏超预期
item.description: 法国私营部门商业活动的萎缩幅度低于预期，制造业的回升无法抵消持续的政治不确定性。【原文：Private-sector business activity in France contracted less than anticipated, with an uptick in manufacturing unable to offset continued political uncertainty.】

item.title: SAP 击败诺和诺德，成为欧洲最具价值的上市公司
item.description: SAP SE 取代丹麦减肥药生产商诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S），成为欧洲最有价值的上市公司。【原文：SAP SE claimed the title of Europe’s most valuable public company, replacing Danish weight-loss drug maker Novo Nordisk A/S.】

item.title: 关税担忧引发动荡，亚洲铜市收紧
item.description: 由于市场猜测特朗普政府将对关键金属征收进口关税，铜价大幅反弹，亚洲铜市趋紧，加剧了全球铜市失调的迹象。【原文：The copper market in Asia is tightening up, adding to signs of worldwide dislocation, as prices rally hard on speculation that the Trump administration will impose import tariffs on the key metal.】

item.title: 西波罗内告诉扩大会议，欧洲央行降息理由已增强
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）表示，自上次决定以来，欧洲中央银行继续降低借贷成本的理由更加充分。【原文：The European Central Bank’s case to keep lowering borrowing costs has strengthened since its last decision, according to Executive Board member Piero Cipollone.】

item.title: 古根海姆的吉姆-米尔斯坦谈 "马阿拉歌协议 "的风险
item.description: 特朗普总统希望提高关税，也希望美国的工业生产更上一层楼。这些我们都知道。与此同时，一些经济学家和学者试图建立一个更大的知识架构，以连贯的方式解释这一战略。他们讲述的故事是：美国从其盟国那里获得国家安全和美国市场准入的报酬，同时美国降低债务和赤字，削弱美元汇率，从而使美国的制造业更有竞争力。【原文：President Trump wants higher tariffs, and he also wants more industrial production in the United States. This we know. In the meantime, a coterie of economists and pundits have tried to assemble a larger intellectual architecture to explain that strategy in a coherent way. The story they tell is one where America gets paid by its allies for national security and access to American markets, while the US brings down its debt and deficits, and weakens the dollar, so as to make US manufacturing more】

item.title: 美国银行印度区主管据称将在任职 15 年后离职
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份备忘录，领导美国银行印度业务的高管 Kaku Nakhate 在为该公司工作 15 年后将离职。【原文：The executive leading Bank of America Corp.’s India business, Kaku Nakhate, is leaving her role after 15 years with the firm, according to a memo seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 小米投资方启明创投寻求 8 亿美元融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，启明创投（Qiming Venture Partners）是科技巨头美团和小米公司的早期支持者，该公司正寻求融资约 8 亿美元，以顺应中国人工智能初创企业再次受到关注的浪潮。【原文：Qiming Venture Partners, the early backer of tech heavyweights Meituan and Xiaomi Corp., is seeking to raise about $800 million to ride a wave of renewed interest in Chinese AI startups, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国股市出现由小盘股转向大盘股的迹象
item.description: 周一，中国小型股继续下挫，因为投资者对市场中风险较高的股票收益的担忧加剧。【原文：A selloff in Chinese small-cap stocks extended on Monday, as investor concerns rise over earnings in riskier corners of the market.】

item.title: 沙特开发商 Umm Al Qura 在利雅得交易首日大涨 30
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的 Umm Al Qura for Development & Construction Co.公司在利雅得首次公开发行 5.23 亿美元后，股价飙升至允许的最高限额。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Umm Al Qura for Development & Construction Co. soared by the maximum allowed limit in its Riyadh debut, following a $523 million initial public offering.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将放缓降息步伐，贝莱德转投美国垃圾债券
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）正利用近期欧洲信贷市场表现出色的机会，在其全球基金中出售一些欧洲垃圾债券，并在美国购买更多债券。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is taking advantage of recent outperformance in European credit markets to sell some junk bonds there and buy more in the US in its global funds.】

item.title: 印度现货石油需求减弱，俄罗斯石油运输量将反弹
item.description: 随着头号供应国俄罗斯的原油供应量恢复到接近正常水平，印度炼油厂在未来几个月可能会减少对现货原油的招标，这凸显了该行业在规避美国制裁方面取得的成功。【原文：Indian refiners are likely to issue fewer tenders for spot crude in the coming months as volumes from top supplier Russia return to near normal levels, highlighting the trade’s success in working around US sanctions.】

item.title: 印度股市有望收复 2025 年跌幅，反弹势头延续
item.description: 由于政府支出回升和货币宽松的早期迹象提振了市场情绪，印度股市距离抹平今年的跌幅仅有一线之隔。【原文：Indian stocks are just a whisker away from erasing this year’s losses as early signs of a pickup in government spending and monetary easing buoys sentiment.】

item.title: 融创债权人告诉法庭公司没有可行的债务计划
item.description: 违约的中国建筑商融创中国控股有限公司（Sunac China Holdings Ltd.）的一位主要债权人向香港一家法院表示，尽管该公司曾表示打算实施新的离岸重组计划，但却没有提出任何条件。【原文：A key creditor of defaulted Chinese builder Sunac China Holdings Ltd. told a Hong Kong court that the company hasn’t offered any terms for a new offshore restructuring, despite saying that it intended to pursue such a plan.】

item.title: 马来西亚央行认为经济增长面临重大障碍
item.description: 马来西亚央行表示，由于酝酿中的全球贸易争端和地缘政治紧张局势威胁到出口，经济增长风险在其货币政策考虑中占据重要位置。【原文：Malaysia’s central bank said growth risks loom large in its monetary policy considerations, as brewing global trade disputes and geopolitical tensions threaten exports.】

item.title: 南非国家电网新增 800 兆瓦容量机组
item.description: 南非国家电力公司将库西勒发电站的一台 800 兆瓦机组并入国家电网，同时不断努力提高发电量并结束计划停电。【原文：South Africa’s state electricity utility added an 800-megawatt unit at the Kusile Power Station to the national grid, amid ongoing efforts to boost generation and bring an end to scheduled outages.】

item.title: PE 公司奥克利资本迅速募集 45 亿欧元旗舰基金
item.description: 奥克利资本公司（Oakley Capital）在六个月内为其旗舰基金筹集了 45 亿欧元（49 亿美元）的资金，打破了艰难的筹资环境。【原文：Oakley Capital has raised €4.5 billion ($4.9 billion) for its flagship fund within six months, defying a tough fundraising environment.】

item.title: 英国将通过减少长期吉尔债券来完善 3,020 亿英镑债券计划
item.description: 英国债务管理办公室预计将于本周三宣布自冠状病毒大流行以来规模最大的一揽子债券销售计划，并将以其历史上最小比例的长期限证券作为甜头。【原文：The UK’s Debt Management Office is expected to announce its largest bond sales package since the coronavirus pandemic on Wednesday, sweetening the offer with the smallest proportion of long-maturity securities in its history.】

item.title: 台湾两年多来首次未达到债券销售目标
item.description: 由于担心唐纳德-特朗普政府的政策，投资者在周一的拍卖会上要求提高收益率，台湾自2022年9月以来首次未能达到发债目标。【原文：Taiwan missed its bond-issuance target for the first time since September 2022 as investors demanded higher yields at an auction Monday due to concern over the policies of Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 亚洲新兴货币走低，关税忧虑扰乱情绪
item.description: 由于投资者权衡美国对该地区经济体征收更多定向关税的影响，亚洲新兴国家的货币与股市一同下跌。政治不确定性继续拖累土耳其里拉。【原文：Currencies in emerging Asia declined along with stocks as investors weighed the fallout of more targeted US tariffs on the region’s economies. Political uncertainty continued to weigh on the Turkish lira.】

item.title: 印度 3 月份经济活动下滑，PMI 指数快报显示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，由于制造业的回升被服务业需求的放缓所抵消，印度 3 月份的经济活动略有下滑。【原文：India’s economic activity slipped slightly in March as a pickup in manufacturing was offset by slowing services sector demand, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟支持迪拜 OSN 推动中东流媒体发展
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros. Discovery）正在收购总部位于迪拜的 OSN Streaming Ltd. 公司的少数股份，以期在快速增长的中东娱乐市场分一杯羹。【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery is taking a minority stake in Dubai-based OSN Streaming Ltd. in a bid to capture a slice of the fast-growing Middle Eastern entertainment market.】

item.title: 印度房屋销售下降 23%，原因是价格高企、买家谨慎
item.description: 根据房地产数据公司 PropEquity 的报告，由于高房价和经济放缓使购房者变得谨慎，印度九大城市 1-3 月份的住房销售量比去年同期下降了 23%。【原文：Housing sales across India’s top nine cities dropped 23% in the January–March quarter over last year, as high prices and a slowing economy are making buyers cautious, according to a report by real estate data firm PropEquity.】

item.title: 土耳其里拉离岸成本、违约掉期维持在近期高点附近
item.description: 在离岸市场上借入土耳其里拉和为该国债务违约投保的成本维持在上周设定的水平附近，这表明在市场经历了一段疯狂时期之后，交易商们仍然深感焦虑。里拉兑美元汇率下跌。【原文：The costs of borrowing Turkish lira in the offshore market and insuring the country’s debt against default are holding near the levels they set last week, a sign that traders remain deeply on edge after a wild period for the market. The lira dipped against the dollar.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片初创公司 FuriosaAI 拒绝了 Meta 8 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，韩国芯片初创公司FuriosaAI拒绝了Meta Platforms公司8亿美元的收购要约，而是选择以独立公司的形式发展业务。【原文：Korean chip startup FuriosaAI has turned down an $800 million takeover offer from Meta Platforms Inc., choosing instead to grow the business as an independent company, a person with knowledge of the matter said.】
